name: AT-AT Driver (V)
Lore: 'Piloting walkers high above the battlefield, AT-AT drivers are protected by 15 centimeters of reinforced armor. Accordingly, they are regarded with contempt by the infantry.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of any combat vehicle he pilots.  While piloting an AT-AT: draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise, you may use 1 Force to deploy a vehicle site on this AT-AT from Reserve Deck; reshuffle, and if just lost, may use 1 Force to place this character in Used Pile.',
